skillTree.localised_description: Dark, feral beasts indigenous to Lustria, tempted from their tropical jungles to bear the Lizardmen to battle.

enabled_if: Leadership is higher than 50% of base
target_if: Unit is a Lord or Hero

skillTree.localised_description: The ultimate jungle hunters, these large, apex predators have terrorised the primordial jungles since the dawn of existence.

enabled_if: Leadership is higher than 50% of base
Leadership is higher than 50% of base
target_if: Unit is a Lord or Hero

skillTree.localised_description: Lizardmen can move with deceptive speed and agility when they have to.
Across the gulf of space, the serene Potec has shared the secrets of time so that the Lizardmen may protect themselves against supernatural attack.

effects.description:
Ambush defence chance: +5%
	(all units in army)

Ambush defence chance: +10%
	(all units in army)

skillTree.localised_description: Those Saurus not lost to war may live to a great age - their long service esteemed and respected by younger Lizardmen hungry for experience.
Who wants to live forever? As it turns out, most beings wouldn't say no…

effects.description: When normally killed in action, this Hero will be wounded instead

skillTree.localised_description: Though he may be hidden before battle is joined, he will not remain so for long.
A veteran and master of the greatest dangers in Lustria.
Having learned much in their long years of service, this character now turns their attention to training others.

effects.description: Character will share +15% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type
Character will share +30% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type
Character will share +50% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type

skillTree.localised_description: Of course, those who live to kill must also kill to live...
The Plan *will* be observed, even if every member of the younger races has to die to achieve the Old Ones' goals.

effects.description: Weapon strength: +10% when fighting against Skaven
Weapon strength: +10% when fighting against Greenskins, Skaven, Dark Elves, Beastmen, Warriors of Chaos, Daemons of Chaos and Norsca

skillTree.localised_description: Creatures with tough hides or some kind of natural armour are tough nuts to crack - even a powerful attack may fall foul of their thick-skin.
This warrior is one with their blade; it is an extension of their will, making them a worthy foe in combat.
The iron will and indomitable presence of this leader ensures their followers remain steadfast when facing peril.
From one bloodied, lifeless corpse to the next, this one is always looking for the next adversary to best.
Such is their power and ferocity, a wound-maker will ravage the foe, cutting and pulverising until there is only one exit - death.
The scars on this storied warrior reveal a veteran of many battles, a being not easy to kill and one worthy of respect and fear.
A blade that sings in defence will not let its wielder be penetrated.
What the enemy cannot see, it cannot hit. What the enemy cannot see, it cannot survive.
The war is endless. The cycle of charging, clashing, and bloody hand-to-hand fighting is without end. It will never stop.
The Lizardmen do not understand why, but something about this Scar-Veteran distracts them from their battle duties.

target_if: Unit is not Lord or Hero

skillTree.localised_description: The Skink artisans will equip the most dangerous Scar-Veterans with the best equipment.
Maintained for millenia by skink attendants within a pyramid-temple, this sacred shield will imbue its user with ancient power.
A useful evolution, present in the most advanced spawnings.
Capable of swift healing, and protected from piercing.
A swift death to any who oppose the Great Plan.

enabled_if: Leadership is higher than 50% of base
target_if: Unit is a Lord or Hero

skillTree.localised_description: The sight of such an honored warrior inspires the enemy to fight with great determination, for to slay him would be to demoralize and disrupt the Lizardmen host.

target_if: Unit is not Lord or Hero

skillTree.localised_description: Standing proud amongst his kind, this Scar-Veteran has survived countless wars.

effects.description:
Upkeep: -2% for Saurus Infantry and Temple Guard units
	(Hero's army)

Upkeep: -4% for Saurus Infantry and Temple Guard units
	(Hero's army)

Upkeep: -8% for Saurus Infantry and Temple Guard units
	(Hero's army)

skillTree.localised_description: Without thought, without understanding, this Saurus instinctively fights and leads his brethren to fight with incredible skill.

effects.description:
Melee attack: +1 for Saurus units
	(Hero's army)

Melee attack: +2 for Saurus units
	(Hero's army)

Melee attack: +3 for Saurus units
	(Hero's army)

skillTree.localised_description: No Saurus has ever died of old age. The longer they live, the stronger they become.
The prey, entrapped, will soon be slaughtered.
A Saurus is calm and still. Until it isn't.

effects.description:
Charge bonus: +20% when in foreign territory
	(Hero's army)

skillTree.localised_description: There's no keeping this one from the battlefield for long.
You think a dagger in my back is going to kill me? Ha! It’s just going to make me mad.
Onwards! To war, and victory!

effects.description:
Leadership: +1 when in foreign territory
	(Hero's army)

Leadership: +1 when in foreign territory
	(Hero's army)

Leadership: +1 when in foreign territory
	(Hero's army)

skillTree.localised_description: True experience is born only on the battlefield.

effects.description:
Weapon strength: +1% for all units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Hero's army)

Weapon strength: +3% for all units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Hero's army)

Weapon strength: +5% for all units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Hero's army)

skillTree.localised_description: You’ll never survive a battle with footwork like that. Here, watch me.

effects.description:
Armour-piercing weapon damage: +1 when defending 
	(Hero's army)

Armour-piercing weapon damage: +2 when defending 
	(Hero's army)

Armour-piercing weapon damage: +3 when defending 
	(Hero's army)

skillTree.localised_description: This is no time for rest and games; up, on your feet! We have work to do.

effects.description:
Unit experience gain per turn: +50
	(own armies factionwide)

skillTree.localised_description: This champion extols discipline and fear away from the battlefield as much as on it.

effects.description: Training action: Experience per turn is increased by an additional 50
Training action: Experience per turn is increased by an additional 100
Training action: Experience per turn is increased by an additional 200

skillTree.localised_description: The sight of this warrior, their stature, import or infamy, can have a calming effect.

effects.description: Spread Control action: Control is modified by an additional 1
Spread Control action: Control is modified by an additional 2
Spread Control action: Control is modified by an additional 3

skillTree.localised_description: "If they know I'm coming then more's the better!"

effects.description: Assault Garrison action: Additional 5% casualties inflicted
Assault Garrison action: Additional 15% casualties inflicted
Assault Garrison action: Additional 30% casualties inflicted

skillTree.localised_description: Such a champion will not bend or break, but slay in their Lord's name.

effects.description: Wound action: Additional 5% chance of wounding target
Wound action: Additional 12% chance of wounding target
Wound action: Additional 21% chance of wounding target

skillTree.localised_description: Lying in wait, experienced and patient, striking when the foe least expects.

effects.description: Assault Units action: Additional 3% casualties inflicted
Assault Units action: Additional 8% casualties inflicted
Assault Units action: Additional 15% casualties inflicted

skillTree.localised_description: An expert in their craft, this Hero knows all the mistakes that can be made and how to best avoid making them.

enabled_if: Leadership is higher than 50% of base
target_if: Unit is a Lord or Hero

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Hidden skill to grant Kroq'Gar's Saurus characters extra scaling
Self-important and opinionated, this one's hubris knows no end.
Self-effacing and unpresuming, he believes that we all have a part to play in the Great Plan, one way or another.
"What are you even for? You're not part of the Great Plan, like all your kind."
"The Plan is the Plan. We shall not deviate or retreat from its path."

effects.description: Hero self-defence: +15% chance of wounding aggressors

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Being fleet of foot is useful in a fight… or when trying to get away afterwards!
Deceit is a perfectly acceptable means of attack.

effects.description:
Ambush success chance: +20%
	(armies in local owned region)

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Having a modicum of resolve is useful in a world that continually tests it.
Self-belief is a fine thing when not misplaced.

effects.description:
Experience gain: +5% for units
	(all units in army)

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Always in control, this one leaves no stone unturned and nothing to chance.
Although actually reading minds is not in their skillset, this one has extraordinary insight into the motives of others.
If you're gonna die, you may as well die with your boots on.
Rugged, resistant, and almost unbreakable, this being can and will take on all comers.
Well built, robust. Powerful.
If you can swing, slash, stab, gouge, or shoot it, this warrior has mastered every aspect of its use.
This being has a plan - not just a game plan, but a master plan to achieve their long-term aims.
Careful planning, knowledge of the terrain and the weaknesses of the enemy are the key to victory.

effects.description:
Enemy battle reinforcement time: +10%
	(all units in army)

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Very rare spawn of self-healing Saurus.
Saurus gather around him.

effects.description:
Physical resistance: 5% for Saurus units
	(all units in army)

Upkeep: -4% for Saurus Infantry and Temple Guard units
	(all units in army)

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Spawned to lead giant monsters.

effects.description:
Leadership: +5 for Stegadon, Bastiladon, Terradon & Carnosaur units
	(all units in army)

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Alone in the jungles of Lustria for many years he watches.

effects.description:
Unit experience gain per turn: +50
	(all units in army)

backgroundSkills.localised_description: A living terror in the mind of his enemies.

effects.description: Weapon strength: +25% when fighting against Skaven
Attribute: Causes Terror when fighting against Skaven

Income from post-battle loot: +5% against Skaven
	(own characters in province)
